COMMAND.NAME: buffervariables
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Report all variable definitions assigned to a buffer
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Report all variable definitions assigned to bufferName
COMMAND.OUTPUT: One line per buffer variable, showing the variable's name and value.
COMMAND.STATUS:
The buffervariables command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
